sections.description: This plugin integrates Bricks Form with the Ecomail API, enabling you to send form data directly to Ecomail. It also incorporates licensing functionality via SureCart to protect and manage plugin usage.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0 - Today's Date

  • Initial release with integration for Bricks Form, Ecomail API and SureCart licensing.
sections.frequently asked questions:
How do I configure the plugin?

Enter your Ecomail API key in the plugin settings and activate your license via the License Settings page in the WordPress admin. For further assistance, please consult the documentation.
